item.title: Special Birthday Present!!
item.description: I finally did it!! As a Birthday Present for my 29th Birthday (Today.), my wife bought me a motorcycle. (Can you believe it?? What a Gal!) I have been_ pining_ for an older bike, so I can fix it up and not have to worry about some serious monetary commitments. Well for $1400 and the cost of a 2XL helmet… (I have a BIG F%^& HEAD!!), I am the proud owner of a 1965 BSA A65 Rocket.
